mapper.select:
select a.coxseq, a.coxcate, a.coxname, a.coxstart, a.coxend, a.coxreqstart, a.coxreqend, a.tuxseq, a.coxintro, a.coxopen, a.coxprog, a.coxscore, a.coxoffice, a.regdate, b.mxseq from course a, tutor b where a.tuxseq = b.tuxseq
and a.coxname like CONCAT('%', #{coxname}, '%')
order by a.coxstart desc, a.coxseq desc
